import sys
import json
import csv
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QApplication, QMainWindow, QWidget, QTabWidget, QVBoxLayout, QPushButton, QFormLayout,
    QLineEdit, QMessageBox, QTreeView, QComboBox, QLabel, QHBoxLayout, QFrame, QTableWidget,
    QTableWidgetItem, QDialog
)
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt
from classes import Student, Instructor, Course

# Part 1



[docs]
class SchoolManagementSystem(QMainWindow):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

        self.students = []
        self.instructors = []
        self.courses = []

        self.initUI()



[docs]
    def initUI(self):
        self.setWindowTitle('School Management System')
        self.setGeometry(100, 100, 800, 600)

        # Main layout
        self.centralWidget = QWidget(self)
        self.setCentralWidget(self.centralWidget)
        self.layout = QVBoxLayout(self.centralWidget)

        # Tab widget
        self.tabs = QTabWidget()
        self.layout.addWidget(self.tabs)

        # Main tab
        self.main_tab = QWidget()
        self.tabs.addTab(self.main_tab, "Main")
        self.main_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.main_tab)

        # Records tab
        self.records_tab = QWidget()
        self.tabs.addTab(self.records_tab, "Records")
        self.records_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.records_tab)

        self.initMainTabUI()
        self.initRecordsTabUI()





[docs]
    def initMainTabUI(self):
        # Save and Load buttons
        option_button_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.main_layout.addLayout(option_button_layout)

        save_button = QPushButton('Save Data')
        save_button.clicked.connect(self.save_data)
        option_button_layout.addWidget(save_button)

        load_button = QPushButton('Load Data')
        load_button.clicked.connect(self.load_data)
        option_button_layout.addWidget(load_button)

        export_button = QPushButton('Export Data as CSV')
        export_button.clicked.connect(self.export_data_as_csv)
        option_button_layout.addWidget(export_button)

        # Add buttons for Student, Instructor, Course
        add_button_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.main_layout.addLayout(add_button_layout)

        student_button = QPushButton('Add Student')
        student_button.clicked.connect(self.student_window)
        add_button_layout.addWidget(student_button)

        instructor_button = QPushButton('Add Instructor')
        instructor_button.clicked.connect(self.instructor_window)
        add_button_layout.addWidget(instructor_button)

        course_button = QPushButton('Add Course')
        course_button.clicked.connect(self.course_window)
        add_button_layout.addWidget(course_button)

        # Add Student Registration for Course section
        self.initStudentRegistrationUI()

        # Add Instructor Assignment to Course section
        self.initInstructorAssignmentUI()





[docs]
    def initStudentRegistrationUI(self):
        # Title
        course_registration_label = QLabel("Student Registration for Course")
        course_registration_label.setStyleSheet("font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px;")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(course_registration_label)

        # Student Name Entry
        student_name_for_course_label = QLabel("Student Name")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(student_name_for_course_label)
        self.student_name_for_course_entry = QLineEdit()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.student_name_for_course_entry)

        # Course Dropdown
        self.selected_course = QComboBox(self)
        self.update_course_combobox()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.selected_course)

        # Register Button
        register_button = QPushButton("Register")
        register_button.clicked.connect(self.register_course)
        self.main_layout.addWidget(register_button)





[docs]
    def initInstructorAssignmentUI(self):
        # Title
        instructor_assignment_label = QLabel("Instructor Assignment to Course")
        instructor_assignment_label.setStyleSheet("font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px;")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(instructor_assignment_label)

        # Instructor Name Entry
        instructor_name_for_course_label = QLabel("Instructor Name")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(instructor_name_for_course_label)
        self.instructor_name_for_course_entry = QLineEdit()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.instructor_name_for_course_entry)

        # Course Dropdown
        self.selected_course_for_instructor = QComboBox(self)
        self.update_course_combobox_for_instructor()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.selected_course_for_instructor)

        # Assign Button
        assign_button = QPushButton("Assign")
        assign_button.clicked.connect(self.assign_instructor_to_course)
        self.main_layout.addWidget(assign_button)





[docs]
    def register_course(self):
        student_name = self.student_name_for_course_entry.text()
        selected_course_name = self.selected_course.currentText()

        student = next((s for s in self.students if s.name == student_name), None)
        course = next((c for c in self.courses if c.course_name == selected_course_name), None)

        if student and course:
            course.add_student(student)
            QMessageBox.information(self, "Success", f"{student.name} has been registered for {course.course_name}.")
        else:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Error", "Student or Course not found.")





[docs]
    def assign_instructor_to_course(self):
        instructor_name = self.instructor_name_for_course_entry.text()
        selected_course_name = self.selected_course_for_instructor.currentText()

        instructor = next((i for i in self.instructors if i.name == instructor_name), None)
        course = next((c for c in self.courses if c.course_name == selected_course_name), None)

        if instructor and course:
            course.instructor = instructor
            QMessageBox.information(self, "Success", f"{instructor.name} has been assigned to {course.course_name}.")
        else:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Error", "Instructor or Course not found.")






[docs]
    def update_course_combobox(self):
        self.selected_course.clear()
        if self.courses:
            self.selected_course.addItems([course.course_name for course in self.courses])
        else:
            self.selected_course.addItem("No Courses Available")





[docs]
    def update_course_combobox_for_instructor(self):
        self.selected_course_for_instructor.clear()
        if self.courses:
            self.selected_course_for_instructor.addItems([course.course_name for course in self.courses])
        else:
            self.selected_course_for_instructor.addItem("No Courses Available")





[docs]
    def export_data_as_csv(self):
        # File path for the exported CSV
        file_path = "school_data.csv"
        
        try:
            with open(file_path, mode='w', newline='') as file:
                writer = csv.writer(file)
                
                # Write headers for each section
                writer.writerow(["Students"])
                writer.writerow(["Name", "Age", "Email", "Student ID"])
                for student in self.students:
                    writer.writerow([student.name, student.age, student.student_id])

                writer.writerow([])  # Empty row between sections

                writer.writerow(["Instructors"])
                writer.writerow(["Name", "Age", "Email", "Instructor ID"])
                for instructor in self.instructors:
                    writer.writerow([instructor.name, instructor.age, instructor.instructor_id])

                writer.writerow([])  # Empty row between sections

                writer.writerow(["Courses"])
                writer.writerow(["Course ID", "Course Name", "Instructor", "Enrolled Students"])
                for course in self.courses:
                    instructor_name = course.instructor.name if course.instructor else "None"
                    enrolled_students = ", ".join([student.name for student in course.enrolled_students])
                    writer.writerow([course.course_id, course.course_name, instructor_name, enrolled_students])

            QMessageBox.information(self, "Success", f"Data exported successfully to {file_path}.")

        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Error", f"An error occurred while exporting: {e}")






[docs]
    def initRecordsTabUI(self):
        # Search Bar and Button
        self.search_entry = QLineEdit()
        self.records_layout.addWidget(self.search_entry)

        search_button = QPushButton('Search')
        search_button.clicked.connect(self.search_records)
        self.records_layout.addWidget(search_button)

        # Tree View for displaying records
        self.table = QTableWidget()
        self.table.setColumnCount(4)
        self.table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(["Type", "Name", "Age", "ID"])
        self.records_layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Delete Button
        delete_button = QPushButton('Delete')
        delete_button.clicked.connect(self.delete_record)
        self.records_layout.addWidget(delete_button)





[docs]
    def save_data(self):
        data = {
            "students": [json.loads(student.to_json()) for student in self.students],
            "instructors": [json.loads(instructor.to_json()) for instructor in self.instructors],
            "courses": [
                {
                    "course_id": course.course_id,
                    "course_name": course.course_name,
                    "instructor": json.loads(course.instructor.to_json()) if course.instructor else None,
                    "enrolled_students": [json.loads(student.to_json()) for student in course.enrolled_students]
                } for course in self.courses
            ]
        }

        try:
            with open('data.json', 'w') as f:
                json.dump(data, f, indent=4)
            QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', 'Data saved successfully!')
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', f'An error occurred: {e}')





[docs]
    def load_data(self):
        try:
            with open('data.json', 'r') as f:
                data = json.load(f)

            self.students = [
                Student(student['name'], student['age'], student['email'], student['student_id'])
                for student in data.get("students", [])
            ]
            self.instructors = [
                Instructor(instructor['name'], instructor['age'], instructor['email'], instructor['instructor_id'])
                for instructor in data.get("instructors", [])
            ]
            self.courses = [
                Course(
                    course['course_id'],
                    course['course_name'],
                    Instructor(course['instructor']['name'], course['instructor']['age'], course['instructor']['email'], course['instructor']['instructor_id'])
                ) for course in data.get("courses", [])
            ]

            self.refresh_treeview()
            self.update_course_combobox()
            QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', 'Data loaded successfully!')
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', f'An error occurred: {e}')





[docs]
    def student_window(self):
        dialog = QDialog(self)
        dialog.setWindowTitle("Add Student")
        dialog.setGeometry(300, 300, 300, 300)

        layout = QFormLayout()
        dialog.setLayout(layout)

        name_entry = QLineEdit()
        age_entry = QLineEdit()
        email_entry = QLineEdit()
        id_entry = QLineEdit()

        layout.addRow('Name:', name_entry)
        layout.addRow('Age:', age_entry)
        layout.addRow('Email:', email_entry)
        layout.addRow('Student ID:', id_entry)

        submit_button = QPushButton('Submit')
        submit_button.clicked.connect(lambda: self.add_student(name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog))
        layout.addWidget(submit_button)

        dialog.exec_()





[docs]
    def add_student(self, name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog):
        name = name_entry.text()
        age = int(age_entry.text())
        email = email_entry.text()
        student_id = int(id_entry.text())

        self.students.append(Student(name, age, email, student_id))
        dialog.close()

    def instructor_window(self):
        dialog = QDialog(self)
        dialog.setWindowTitle("Add Instructor")
        dialog.setGeometry(300, 300, 300, 300)

        layout = QFormLayout()
        dialog.setLayout(layout)

        name_entry = QLineEdit()
        age_entry = QLineEdit()
        email_entry = QLineEdit()
        id_entry = QLineEdit()

        layout.addRow('Name:', name_entry)
        layout.addRow('Age:', age_entry)
        layout.addRow('Email:', email_entry)
        layout.addRow('Instructor ID:', id_entry)

        submit_button = QPushButton('Submit')
        submit_button.clicked.connect(lambda: self.add_instructor(name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog))
        layout.addWidget(submit_button)

        dialog.exec_()





[docs]
    def add_instructor(self, name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog):
        name = name_entry.text()
        age = int(age_entry.text())
        email = email_entry.text()
        instructor_id = int(id_entry.text())

        self.instructors.append(Instructor(name, age, email, instructor_id))
        dialog.close()
        self.refresh_treeview()






[docs]
    def course_window(self):
        dialog = QDialog(self)
        dialog.setWindowTitle("Add Course")
        dialog.setGeometry(300, 300, 300, 200)

        layout = QFormLayout()
        dialog.setLayout(layout)

        course_id_entry = QLineEdit()
        course_name_entry = QLineEdit()

        layout.addRow('Course ID:', course_id_entry)
        layout.addRow('Course Name:', course_name_entry)

        submit_button = QPushButton('Submit')
        submit_button.clicked.connect(lambda: self.add_course(course_id_entry, course_name_entry, dialog))
        layout.addWidget(submit_button)

        dialog.exec_()





[docs]
    def add_course(self, course_id_entry, course_name_entry, dialog):
        course_id = int(course_id_entry.text())
        course_name = course_name_entry.text()

        instructor = self.instructors[0] if self.instructors else None  # Assign the first instructor, or none if no instructors exist
        self.courses.append(Course(course_id, course_name, instructor))
        dialog.close()
        self.refresh_treeview()





[docs]
    def refresh_treeview(self):
        self.table.setRowCount(0)  # Clear the table

        # Add Students to the table
        for student in self.students:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Student"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(student.name))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(student.age)))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(student.student_id)))

        # Add Instructors to the table
        for instructor in self.instructors:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Instructor"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(instructor.name))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor.age)))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor.instructor_id)))

        # Add Courses to the table
        for course in self.courses:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Course"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(course.course_name))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(""))  # Courses don't have an age
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(course.course_id)))





[docs]
    def search_records(self):
        search_term = self.search_entry.text().lower()
        
        # Clear the table first
        self.table.setRowCount(0)
        
        # Search Students
        for student in self.students:
            if search_term in student.name.lower() or search_term in str(student.student_id):
                row = self.table.rowCount()
                self.table.insertRow(row)
                self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Student"))
                self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(student.name))
                self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(student.age)))
                self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(student.student_id)))

        # Search Instructors
        for instructor in self.instructors:
            if search_term in instructor.name.lower() or search_term in str(instructor.instructor_id):
                row = self.table.rowCount()
                self.table.insertRow(row)
                self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Instructor"))
                self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(instructor.name))
                self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor.age)))
                self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor.instructor_id)))

        # Search Courses
        for course in self.courses:
            if search_term in course.course_name.lower() or search_term in str(course.course_id):
                row = self.table.rowCount()
                self.table.insertRow(row)
                self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Course"))
                self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(course.course_name))
                self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(""))  # No age for courses
                self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(course.course_id)))





[docs]
    def delete_record(self):
        # Get the currently selected row
        selected_row = self.table.currentRow()

        if selected_row == -1:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Error", "Please select a record to delete.")
            return

        # Get the record type from the first column of the selected row
        record_type = self.table.item(selected_row, 0).text()
        record_id = self.table.item(selected_row, 3).text()

        # Confirm deletion
        confirm = QMessageBox.question(self, 'Confirm Deletion', f"Are you sure you want to delete this {record_type}?",
                                    QMessageBox.Yes | QMessageBox.No, QMessageBox.No)

        if confirm == QMessageBox.Yes:
            try:
                if record_type == "Student":
                    # Find and remove the student from the students list
                    self.students = [student for student in self.students if str(student.student_id) != record_id]
                elif record_type == "Instructor":
                    # Find and remove the instructor from the instructors list
                    self.instructors = [instructor for instructor in self.instructors if str(instructor.instructor_id) != record_id]
                elif record_type == "Course":
                    # Find and remove the course from the courses list
                    self.courses = [course for course in self.courses if str(course.course_id) != record_id]

                # Remove the row from the table
                self.table.removeRow(selected_row)

                QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', f'{record_type} deleted successfully.')

            except Exception as e:
                QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', f'An error occurred while deleting the record: {e}')





if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = QApplication(sys.argv)
    ex = SchoolManagementSystem()
    ex.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
